thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 29 of 3553
thread.title: Gaylene

author: Gaylene
title: Gaylene
text:
I have ordered many books from Thrift Books. I have never been disappointed in the quality of the books I've bought or the promptness of shipping.
The books are accurately described and fairly priced for their condition. A wishlist and notify option is provided when books you're looking for aren't immediately in stock.
The amount to spend to get free shipping is ridiculously low and books I've ordered have always arrived promptly.
For a book lover, nothing is better than getting books in the mail. I've ordered textbooks, cookbooks, novels, non-fiction and poetry from Thrift Books. The selection is vast and the service is excellent. If you haven't tried Thrift Books, you're in for a treat!
